short_description: The Shib Paper outlines the foundation of a decentralized society that seeks to transcend traditional centralized structures. This society aims to adopt and enhance the essence of these structures to cater to a world desiring both independence and interconnection​​. Central to this vision is the Shib token, which, with its widespread acceptance and significant appreciation, serves as the community's guiding light and a symbol of the system's deflationary nature​​.
long_description: The Shib Paper articulates the Shibarium blockchain's vision, prioritizing accessibility, integrity, and technological innovation. It upholds a Proof-of-Stake system, involving Delegators and Validators for network security, emphasizing Validator reliability and expertise. The paper advocates for fair and transparent AI practices, ensuring unbiased standards and digital ownership rights for Shibizens. It emphasizes technological stewardship, equitable access, and a community-centric approach, fostering shared responsibility and equal technology access. Central to this vision are principles of self-sovereignty, decentralization for security, and user-centric design. The framework encourages innovation, ethical AI usage, transparency in operations, and collaborative growth of the Shibarium ecosystem.
target_audience: Shibizens, Blockchain Enthusiasts, Technologists

short_description: OracleAI leverages data analytics and AI for investment strategy enhancement, featuring a KOL tracker, influencer analytics, and various order types, with innovations like a TG bot, gasless swaps, and unique market insight tools, supported by a simple tax structure on transactions.
long_description: OracleAI uses data analytics and predictive models to enhance investment strategies, countering market inefficiencies and analyzing trends and sentiment shifts. It features a KOL tracker, influencer analytics, and various order types, plus live token metrics and customizable tools. Exclusive features are unlocked by staking $ORACLE tokens. Innovations include a custom TG bot, gasless swaps, and an AI tool for market insights. It offers a tax structure of 5% on buys, 5% on sales, and 0% on transfers, with KYC and audit documentation maintained with Cyberscope for security. Maximum supply is 1,000,000,000 tokens.
target_audience: Crypto enthusiasts and participants in the AI tokenn sector, looking for community-driven projects.

short_description: Shiba Inu, or SHIB, is the main token of the Shib Ecosystem, offering a decentralized, community-led currency.
long_description: Shiba Inu (SHIB) is a decentralized cryptocurrency that emerged as a part of the Shib Ecosystem. Launched in late 2020, this Ethereum-based token quickly gained popularity worldwide. It's known for its community-driven approach and is now accepted as a payment method in various locations, either directly or through third-party intermediaries. SHIB is a part of a broader ecosystem that includes other tokens and services such as Leash, Bone, Shiboshis, and Welly Friends, emphasizing its role in decentralized finance. Designed as an experiment in decentralized spontaneous community building, SHIB has grown to become a massive influence in the crypto space around the world.
target_audience: Crypto enthusiasts and participants in the meme coin sector, looking for community-driven projects.

short_description: Leash, known as 'Doge Killer', is part of the Shiba Inu ecosystem, originally created as a rebase token.
long_description: With a total supply of just 107,646 tokens, LEASH is positioned as a special token for loyal supporters of the ecosystem, enabling holders to benefit from exclusive perks and limited-edition access. With the added utility of governance over certain aspects of the Shib decentralized structure, this token is an amazing component of the Shib Ecosystem.
target_audience: Crypto investors and supporters of the Shiba Inu ecosystem, especially those interested in unique tokenomics and limited supply tokens.

short_description: Bone is the governance token of the ShibaSwap platform, part of the Shiba Inu ecosystem.
long_description: With a total supply of 250,000,000 tokens, BONE is the foundation of the powerful Shibarium L2 network. All Shibarium users will need BONE to power transactions as a gas fee, making it vital to the decentralized ecosystem. Moreover, it is one of the ecosystem's governance tokens, and governs technology in this unique global decentralized structure. Woof!
target_audience: DeFi enthusiasts and Shiba Inu community members interested in participating in governance and decentralized exchange platforms.

short_description: K9 Finance is a decentralized project within the Shibarium ecosystem and an official partner of Shiba Inu. They focus on yield generation and capital bridging, with strategic partnerships and support for Shibarium validators.
long_description: K9 Finance, a partner of Shiba Inu, represents a pioneering approach in the decentralized finance (DeFi) sector, particularly within the Shibarium blockchain ecosystem. The project aims to establish a fully decentralized finance model that prioritizes sustainability and resilience. Key features include a token structure designed for long-term growth and stability, alongside a Liquidity Staking Derivative (LSD) model tailored for the Shibarium platform. Liquid staking allows users to enjoy the benefits of staking while still being able to use their staked tokens freely. This is achieved through a LSD receipt token, denoted as $knBONE, which can be used in various trading and DeFi opportunities. Collectively, these elements aim to achieve K9 Finance's goal of providing robust yield-generation opportunities and facilitating efficient capital bridging in the crypto space. The pre-sale has sold out. The total supply of $KNINE tokens is 999,999,999,999, with the initial circulating supply at TGE estimated to be 7.5%, amounting to 75 billion tokens.
target_audience: Crypto investors and Shibarium community members interested in decentralized finance and yield generation opportunities.

short_description: The LumiBots NFT collection encapsulates the essence of innovation, futurism, and our collective human fascination with technology.
long_description: Lumibots: 'Illuminate the Future' is a unique NFT collection where technology meets tradition, created by the talented Shib Army artists. This collection merges the advanced world of robotics with the classic glow of lightbulbs, offering an immersive digital experience. Each Lumibot is a meticulously crafted piece, ranging from sleek androids to retro cyborgs, embodying the fusion of humanity and machinery. Central to each piece is the iconic lightbulb, symbolizing enlightenment, transformation, and infinite possibilities.This NFT series not only showcases innovation and futuristic vision but also taps into our fascination with technology. It offers a unique digital key to a world where imagination is limitless, encouraging owners to explore the intersection of robotics and traditional light sources. By acquiring a Lumibot, you join a narrative that celebrates the evolution of art and technology, pushing creative boundaries and shaping the future.
target_audience: Crypto investors and Shibarium community members interested in NFTs and yield generation opportunities.

short_description: Mojo is a cryptocurrency project featuring Shib and Bone reflections, aimed at providing rewards to token holders.
long_description: Mojo ($MOJO) is a crypto project, live on both Ethereum and Shibarium, that focuses on rewarding its community. It leverages the concept of reflections, a mechanism where token holders receive additional tokens (in this case, Shib and Bone) as a form of passive income. This approach encourages long-term holding and community engagement. The project details, such as its technical infrastructure, tokenomics, and strategic goals, are outlined in its whitepaper. Mojo is built around the Shiba Inu ecosystem, providing AI solutions, such as a unique, powerful and user-friendly AI image generation system, free to use. Total Supply: 10,000,000,000,000. Buy Tax: 2% (2% Rewards in $SHIB). Sell Tax: 4% (2% Rewards in $SHIB & 2% in Liquidity).
target_audience: Cryptocurrency enthusiasts, particularly those interested in passive income streams and holders of Shib and Bone tokens.

short_description: Toad Killer is a meme token, featuring the $TOAD token, with a theme of dominance over other 'animal' tokens in the crypto world.
long_description: Toad Killer is a unique and playful venture in the cryptocurrency world, diverging from the usual animal-themed token market. It distinguishes itself with its humorous and competitive language, notably claiming superiority over other animal-themed tokens. It uses metaphors like making 'frog soup,' signifying its dominance in the crypto 'animal kingdom.' The $TOAD token reflects this spirit, with a total supply of 420,690,000,000,000. Its tokenomics are crafted to encourage participation and growth: 90% of the tokens are available for trading on Uniswap, and the remaining 10% are kept in the project's wallet. The initial liquidity was set with 10 ETH. Significantly, the liquidity provider (LP) token has been burnt to promote transparency and trust in the project's management. Additionally, the project maintains strong connections with the Shibarium community.
target_audience: Cryptocurrency enthusiasts and investors interested in thematic, animal-related tokens and those looking for new and provocative projects in the crypto space.

short_description: Shibacals is a company that offers a range of physical goods integrated with NFC technology, providing additional benefits like VIP NFT access or surprise coupons.
long_description: Shibacals aims to empower the crypto community by offering a diverse range of physical goods, from fashion items to toys and travel essentials. These products come with an NFC chip for added value, such as VIP NFT access or surprise coupons. The project is integrated with the Shibarium blockchain and focuses on delivering high-quality merchandise. They offer a seamless, end-to-end creation journey for their products, from 3D modeling to global distribution.
target_audience: Crypto enthusiasts and the general public interested in physical goods with blockchain integration.

short_description: ShibaPunkz is the first 10,000 NFT collection fully minted on Shibarium, featuring its own token, $SPUNK, as part of the 'Woofie Town' ecosystem. The project aims to build a strong community focused on crypto adoption and entertainment. It also integrates with $BONE for various features.
long_description: ShibaPunkz is a pioneering NFT collection, being the first to fully mint 10,000 NFTs on the Shibarium blockchain. It features its own native token, $SPUNK, which is integral to its 'Woofie Town' ecosystem. After establishing its NFT collection as a potential original cornerstone of Shibarium, the $SPUNK token has gained increasing traction. The project has also launched the first lottery dapp on Shibarium, initially using $BONE and later incorporating $SPUNK. The token is slated to be the currency for future minting and will play a central role in upcoming Play-to-Earn (P2E) games, where the NFTs will be key characters. ShibaPunkz aims to build the strongest community in Shibarium, educating people on crypto adoption while providing entertainment. It seeks to continue the vision of Ryoshi by pushing for mass crypto adoption and contributing to the growth of the ShibArmy.
target_audience: NFT enthusiasts and crypto lovers who enjoy building a community.

short_description: Baby Brick Inu is a Shibarium-based 'Mutual Fund' offering a 3-token reward system. The project aims to become one of the most trusted on Shibarium, providing an instant diversified portfolio for holders. It also rewards with $BONE.
long_description: Baby Brick Inu serves as a 'Mutual Fund' within the Shibarium ecosystem, offering a unique 3-token reward system. When investors buy one token, they effectively receive three tokens in total, diversifying their Shibarium portfolio instantly. The project's primary focus is to reward its holders 'Brick by Brick,' enabling them to earn $BONE tokens as well. Baby Brick Inu has locked 25% of its supply, which not only adds a layer of security but also acts as a token 'burn' mechanism. This locked wallet accrues both Brick by Brick Tokens and $BONE tokens, effectively reducing their overall supplies. The project aims to establish itself as one of the most trusted initiatives on Shibarium, offering both diversification and rewards to its community.
target_audience: Everyone

short_description: $BRICK is a token fueling the 'Brick by Brick' initiative, aimed at promoting global Shibarium adoption. The DAO wallet, funded by a 3/3 tax and 1.5% $BONE rewards, supports various blockchain projects and innovations.
long_description: Brick by Brick is a comprehensive initiative powered by the $BRICK token, with a limited supply of 100,000 and a 3/3 tax structure. It aims to accelerate global adoption of Shibarium, a blockchain platform. The initiative focuses on educating investors, supporting valuable blockchain projects, and investing in innovative technologies. A 1.5% $BONE reward is distributed to all BRICK holders, while another 1.5% goes into the DAO wallet for various use-cases like marketing and development. $BRICK holders can vote in the DAO and submit suggestions or project proposals, which are reviewed by Teh Foundation. Voting is conducted through the $BRICK DAO Dapp, and holders can 'sacrifice' their tokens for increased influence on critical decisions. The initiative offers affordable promotional opportunities and potential for direct DAO investments.

short_description: WOOF Swap is a ve(3,3) DEX on Shibarium, focusing on liquidity and community governance. It offers fast transactions and incentivization. Earn rewards in $BONE with the ShibArmy.
long_description: WOOF Swap is a community-led DEX on Shibarium, offering liquidity, voting, and rewards. Utilizing zk-rollups for efficiency, the protocol balances reward distribution and encourages strategic voting. Measures are in place to direct emissions to beneficial liquidity sources, aiming for sustainable growth and long-term value.
target_audience: ShibArmy

short_description: Bark is a token that rewards and burns $SHIB for its holders.
long_description: Bark offers its holders 2% $SHIB rewards and burns 1% $SHIB per transaction. The initial liquidity pool was burned, and half the supply was sent to Vitalik Buterin, following $SHIB's original strategy. Bark aims to strengthen both $SHIB and Shibarium communities through its rewards and is the first $SHIB reward and burn token on Shibarium.

short_description: Coinmerge (CMOS) is a multi-faceted Web3 enterprise offering a range of decentralized finance services and products.
long_description: Based in Texas, USA, Coinmerge Technologies Inc. specializes in decentralized finance with over two years in the field. Their core product, the Coinmerge Operating System (CMOS), hosts a suite of decentralized apps for streamlined crypto trading and tracking. Beyond CMOS, Coinmerge serves as a marketing agency and offers a wide array of services like AMA sessions, KYC, and Smart Contract development. Targeting the Web3 ecosystem, they collaborate with Shibarium and Shiba-related projects. Their primary liquidity pair is $BONE.
target_audience: Users of Shibarium Network

short_description: Sharbi, distinguished as the 'Sovereign of Memes,' champions the journey towards genuine decentralization with a unique tokenomics model. It rewards holders with USDC/BONE, features low taxes, no marketing wallet or dev fees, and secures liquidity with a 10-year LP lock, embodying the Shibarium vision of community empowerment and financial innovation.
long_description: Sharbi distinguishes itself in the Shibarium ecosystem as a dynamic platform, blending educational initiatives through Shibarium University with novel financial mechanisms. It enhances user engagement with USDC/BONE rewards, a minimal 5% sell/buy tax, complete supply distribution, and a cap of 20B Sharbi per wallet. Its multi-chain framework spans Ethereum, Arbitrum, and Shibarium, amplifying its reach and functionality, which is further expanded through Sharbi Crypto Virtual Cards by Zypto for assorted services like bill payments and gift card acquisitions. Additionally, Sharbi's commitment to security is solidified by a successful CertiK audit. Elevating its market presence, Sharbi's limited edition NFTs and collection are now live on OpenSea, showcasing its evolution beyond a meme token to a beacon of education, empowerment, and financial inclusivity in the digital realm.
target_audience: Users of Shibarium Network

short_description: BabySPUNK is a captivating meme token on the Shibarium Blockchain. It offers its holders substantial rewards in Shibarium Punkz (SPUNK) for every transaction. The token imposes a 1% transaction limit and caps the maximum wallet size at 2%. Additionally, its liquidity is locked for a decade, ensuring long-term stability.
long_description: BabySPUNK is not just another meme token; it's a burgeoning community on the Shibarium Blockchain. With a limited total supply of 1,000,000 tokens, it aims to be a valuable asset for its holders. Both buying and selling transactions incur a 5% fee, which is distributed as 1% burn and 4% rewards to holders. The project is committed to long-term sustainability, continually expanding its team with specialists. BabySPUNK is more than a token; it's a movement aiming to spread humor, entertainment, and a sense of community among its holders.
target_audience: Users of Shibarium Network

short_description: Marswap Farming Token ($MSWAPF) is the governance token of the number one Marswap Exchange on Shibarium.
long_description: Marswap Farming Token ($MSWAPF) redefines DeFi on the Shibarium Chain by incentivizing liquidity providers and stakers through its innovative rewards system. $MSWAPF empowers users to participate actively, generating rewards while contributing to the Marswap ecosystem's growth.
target_audience: Every user of Shibarium Network

short_description: ChewySwap is the leading Community-Based decentralized exchange on Shibarium and Dogechain, the two leading EVM compatible blockchains for Dog lovers.
long_description: ChewySwap is a distinctive decentralized exchange (DEX) operating on the Shibarium and Dogechain networks, designed to enhance your trading experience in the Doggy Blockchain ecosystem. The platform boasts a variety of features, including NFTs, staking, and farming. Committed to transparency and security, ChewySwap's smart contracts are audited, and it is backed by a seasoned development team. Moreover, it dedicates 2% of all trading fees to animal charities, as determined by community votes. With its low to near-zero transaction fees and multiple avenues for token earnings, ChewySwap offers a comprehensive solution for both experienced DeFi traders and newcomers alike. The project's ethos is rooted in principles of community empowerment, public good, and minimal fees.
target_audience: DeFi traders, Liquidity Providers, SHIB holders, Crypto Newbies

short_description: The Chewy Token is ChewySwap's reward token for staking and farming, designed with sustainability and utility in enhancing ecosystem engagement.
long_description: Chewy Token serves as the primary reward for Chewy Swap's farming and staking pools, with innovative strategies to sustain its value and utility. Chewy Swap plans to introduce ways to use Chewy Tokens for fair launches, single token and NFT staking pools, liquidity pairing within the Shibarium ecosystem, and a 'Lucky Dog Lottery'. The initial supply is set at 1 million $CHEWY, with an emission rate of 0.1 $CHEWY per block. Tokenomics allocate 60% to farms, 30% to pools, and 10% to a combination of burned LP and token burn, ensuring no tax, max wallet, or transaction limits to foster growth and utility.
target_audience: DeFi traders, Liquidity Providers, SHIB holders, Crypto Newbies

id: The Shiba Sequoia Forest Lads NFT Collection
project_name: The Shiba Sequoia Forest Lads NFT Collection
short_description: A unique 10,000-piece music NFT collection featuring 25 songs from web3 musicians, 3D artwork, and tangible benefits including annual festival tickets, music publishing rights, and artwork IP rights.
long_description: The Shiba Sequoia Forest Lads NFT Collection comprises 10,000 unique NFTs, each featuring a song from web3 musicians, 3D artwork created by the project initiator, and a myriad of benefits. Holders of these NFTs gain annual access to all ShibaFest festivals, publishing rights to the music, and intellectual property rights to the artwork. In a unique twist, each NFT also includes a claim for a Giant Sequoia Tree clone, originating from a tree planted by the musicians at the festivals. The project is establishing nurseries, festivals, and other businesses to provide rewards to NFT holders, liquidity for the DAO, and support for the entire ecosystem. Through art, music, blockchain technology, and tree preservation, this collection and DAO aim to enrich both local and web3 communities, adding value to local economies and the Shibarium platform.
target_audience: NFT Enthusiasts on Shibarium Blockchain

short_description: SimpleHub is an innovative project aiming to simplify cryptocurrency experiences for users at all levels.
long_description: SimpleHub is a comprehensive platform that integrates top utilities from various projects, including bots, crypto wallets, and tools. It's designed to streamline the crypto experience, offering powerful tools and educational resources in a single platform. Features include Anonymous Swaps and a diverse bot collection, making crypto more accessible and secure.
target_audience: Crypto enthusiasts of all levels seeking a simplified and comprehensive crypto experience.

short_description: Bad Idea AI is a decentralized experiment combining Blockchain, AI, and DAOs in a unique, meme-worthy concoction, aiming to test AI's role in society.
long_description: Bad Idea AI embodies a bold experiment that integrates AI, Blockchain, and DAOs within a decentralized ecosystem. Its aim is to investigate the capacity of AI to collaborate with humans in driving societal progress or, alternatively, to precipitate a dystopian future. The project underscores its decentralized essence and commitment to community involvement, establishing it as a collaborative effort to harness AI's benefits for humanity. It features a utility-based burn mechanism that depends on revenue generated from advertisements and sales. Bad Idea AI proudly partners with the Shiba Inu community, actively supporting projects that seek to assist or innovate on the Shibarium blockchain. As a 0% tax token, its key initiatives include the Bad Idea AI chatbot system and the BadIdeas.ai AI News platform. $BAD is listed on Bitmart, Bitget, MEXC, LBank, Uniswap, SushiSwap, ShibaSwap and more.
target_audience: Tech enthusiasts, blockchain and AI communities, and those interested in experimental crypto projects.

short_description: Shiboshis are a collection of 10,000 unique, lovable Shiba Inu NFTs on the Ethereum blockchain, with varied traits and utilities in the Shiboshi Game.
long_description: The Shiboshis are an exclusive collection of 10,000 Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), released on October 14, 2021. Each Shiboshi represents a unique, randomly-generated pixel art Shiba avatar with varying traits that make each unique and collectible. These traits include visual elements for eyes, mouth, headwear, clothes, fur color, accessories, background, and each trait enhances the base ShibaStrength in the upcoming Shiboshi Game. Owners of Shiboshis also gain access to the SHIBOSHI Social Club, unique naming rights, and special privileges in SHIB: The Metaverse.
target_audience: NFT collectors, Shiba Inu enthusiasts, blockchain gamers
